Container.Name: Unturned
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Unturned and run it (if you want to install Rocket Mod set the Variable 'Install Rocket Mod' to 'true' without quotes).
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!

Container.Description:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Unturned and run it (if you want to install Rocket Mod set the Variable 'Install Rocket Mod' to 'true' without quotes).

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container download at startup. (https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

Config.Name: GAME_PARAMS
Config.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Install Rocket Mod
Config.Description: Set to 'true' (without quotes) to install Rocket Mod otherwise leave blank

Config.Name: Rocket Mod Force Update
Config.Description: If you want to force a update of Rocket Mod set to 'true' (without quotes) ATTENTION: All files in the 'Modules' & 'Scripts' folder will be overwritten backup the files bevor doing that!

Config.Name: TCP1 - Game Port
Config.Description: TCP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change it in the 'Show more settings ...' section below) ATTENTION: Don't forget that you must set 2 other ports GAME_PORT +1 & GAME_PORT +2

Config.Name: UDP2 - Game Port
Config.Description: UDP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change it in the 'Show more settings ...' section below) ATTENTION: Don't forget that you must set 2 other ports GAME_PORT +1 & GAME_PORT +2

Config.Name: Rocket Mod Download URL
Config.Description: Only change if you are know what you are doing

Config.Name: Base Game Port
Config.Description: If you change this setting don't forget to delete the gameport above and create 3 entries for TCP and 3 entries for UDP (GAME_PORT +2 TCP & GAME_PORT UDP +2)
